name: Life Saver
description: The Life Saver is a popular dock organization solution that helps keep your space tidy by securely holding life jackets, floats, or plants. It includes a mounting block, a collapsible hanger, a tool and floater, stainless steel nuts, and a Velcro strap (carabiners sold separately). Key features include its capacity to hold up to six items, holes for easy attachment of carabiners, a collapsible design for space-saving, UV resistance, and easy installation. Proudly made in the U.S.A, it comes with an exclusive lifetime warranty, ensuring durability and quality. Upgrade your dock organization with the Life Saver for a more functional and organized area.

name: EZ Flag Bloxx
description: The EZ Flag Bloxx is a dock accessory designed for displaying flags, allowing you to add a personal touch to your dock or boat slip. It includes a Flag Bloxx, a DockBloxx Tool & Floater, and stainless steel nuts (with 2 required). Flags and flag poles are sold separately. Key features include easy installation, UV resistance for durability, and it is proudly made in the USA. Additionally, it comes with a lifetime warranty. Enhance your dock’s appearance and showcase your pride with the EZ Flag Bloxx.

name: Universal Bloxx
description: Universal Bloxx is a convenient and secure accessory mount for docks, allowing you to attach items like cameras, solar panels, and lights without damaging your dock. It includes a mounting Bloxx, pad, tool, and stainless-steel nuts. Key features include versatile mounting, secure attachment, easy installation, UV resistance, and a Lifetime Warranty. Made in the U.S.A., Universal Bloxx enhances your dock's functionality with hassle-free accessory mounting.

name: Flag Pole and USA Flag
description: The American Flag Pole Kit is a complete solution for displaying the American flag, which includes flagpoles, rings, brackets, and a 3x5 flag. The kit allows for adjustable lengths from 1.3 ft to 5 ft, making it suitable for different flag sizes. It features two flag rings to keep the flag secure and prevent curling in the wind, ensuring easy installation for versatile use in various settings.

name: HOSE 'n Boats
description: Hose 'N Boats Bloxx are stylish and practical hose mounts designed for docks. Made from stainless steel, they enhance the dock's appearance while preventing tripping hazards by securely holding hoses. Installation is simple and quick, and they are marina-approved for safety and quality. These mounts are UV resistant and come with a lifetime warranty. Proudly made in the U.S.A, they offer a combination of style, safety, and durability for your dock.

name: Banjo Bloxx
description: Banjo Bloxx is a dock accessory designed to securely hold paddles, brushes, brooms, and other pole-based items. Each kit includes two mounting Bloxx and can support up to five devices. Key features include secure mounting for windy conditions, versatile use for various items, easy installation with included hardware, and durable, UV-resistant construction. Proudly made in the USA, Banjo Bloxx also comes with a lifetime warranty for quality assurance. It's an effective solution for keeping your dock organized and clutter-free.

name: Bucket Bloxx
description:
Introducing Bucket Bloxx, the versatile solution for managing trash and wash buckets at the dock. Designed to fit various 5-gallon buckets, it offers width and height adjustability for convenience and stability. The product includes a highly-adjustable bucket holder and a DockBloxx tool, with stainless steel nuts for secure installation. 

Key features include:

- Adjustable for different bucket styles
- Height-adjustable base for secure placement
- Can be used as a trash receptacle or wash bucket holder
- Easy installation
- Made in the U.S.A.
- UV resistant for durability
- Comes with a lifetime warranty

Bucket Bloxx is the ideal addition to simplify your dockside activities.

name: Velcro
description: The DockBloxx Velcro Strap is a durable and versatile accessory, measuring 2 inches wide and 14 inches long. Made from high-quality elastic material, it securely fastens various items like hoses, cords, and tools. Its Velcro closure allows for easy adjustment, making it simple to use. This multipurpose strap is perfect for organizing equipment and bundling items on your dock. Upgrade your dock organization with the DockBloxx Velcro Strap for reliable quality and convenience.

name: Ultimate Wash Station
description: The Ultimate Wash Station is a convenient cleaning accessory for boats and docks, designed to simplify the washing process. It includes holders for a hose, brush, and beverages, allowing you to keep everything organized without dropping items or losing your drink. The package contains a mounting block, various holders, a cup insert, a tool, and stainless steel nuts for easy installation. Key features include a complete cleaning solution, a dedicated brush holder to prevent drops, a secure cup holder, and UV resistance for durability. It’s made in the U.S.A and comes with a lifetime warranty, ensuring quality and reliability. Upgrade your boat cleaning routine with the Ultimate Wash Station!

name: Smash Bloxx
description: Smash Bloxx is a heavy-duty can crusher designed to simplify waste management on your dock. It mounts easily to your dock post and crushes cans to reduce their size for easier disposal or recycling. The product includes a mounting bloxx, can crusher, DockBloxx tool and floater, and stainless steel nuts. Key features include efficient waste reduction, durable construction, easy installation, and UV resistance. It supports eco-friendly practices by minimizing landfill space and can be paired with Bucket Bloxx for additional storage options. The product comes with a lifetime warranty and is made in the U.S.A.

name: Tube Bloxx
description: Tube Bloxx is a secure storage solution for tow-behind tubes on your dock. It easily attaches to a dock post and features a built-in heavy-duty rope loop for quick connections, as well as a Velcro strap for organizing your tow rope. The product includes one Tube Bloxx unit, a universal quick-connect rope, a DockBloxx tool and floater, three stainless steel nuts, and a Velcro strap. Key features include easy installation, UV resistance for durability, and an exclusive lifetime warranty. Tube Bloxx is made in the U.S.A. and provides a convenient way to keep your tow-behind organized and out of the way.

name: Elevate Your Float Bloxx
description: Elevate Your Float Bloxx is a practical accessory designed to enhance your dock experience by keeping your floating mat securely hoisted and out of the way. The product includes a high-mounted bloxx with a pulley, a low-mounted neat cleat bloxx, a secure harness, nylon rope for easy operation, a DockBloxx tool and floater, and six stainless steel nuts. Key features include customizable design for a perfect fit, secure hoisting to prevent dock clutter, marina approval for safety, easy installation, UV resistance for durability, and a lifetime warranty. Made in the U.S.A, it's an effective solution for optimizing your dock space and ensuring your floating mat is always ready for use.

name: SUP Bloxx
description: SUP Bloxx is a storage solution for paddle boards, featuring secure, padded cradles that protect your board and keep it ready for use. The kit includes a set of cradles, nylon straps, a dock tool, and stainless steel nuts. Key features include easy installation, UV resistance, and the option to pair with Banjo Bloxx for paddle storage. Made in the U.S.A. and backed by a lifetime warranty, SUP Bloxx offers convenient and reliable storage for paddle boarders.

name: YAK Bloxx
description: Kayak Bloxx is a secure storage solution designed for kayakers to safely store their kayaks at docks. The kit includes two padded kayak cradles, high-quality nylon straps, a tool, and stainless steel nuts. Key features include secure storage that prevents damage, easy installation, compatibility with various kayak sizes, and UV resistance for durability. It's proudly made in the U.S.A. and comes with a lifetime warranty for added peace of mind. Kayak Bloxx offers a reliable way to keep your kayak ready for your next adventure.

name: Mounting Pad
description: The DockBloxx Mounting Pad is a versatile accessory that allows you to securely attach customer-provided equipment like cameras, solar panels, lights, and bells to your dock without drilling. It offers a stable surface for various devices, is easy to install, and is made from durable materials to withstand outdoor conditions. This product enhances the functionality of your dock while providing a reliable and convenient mounting solution.
